effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used grass pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon have halved Speed for four turns (including this one).
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used grass pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon have halved Speed for four turns (including this one).

short_effect.x_y: With Grass Pledge, halves opposing Pokémon’s Speed for four turns.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: With Grass Pledge, halves opposing Pokémon’s Speed for four turns.

flavor_text.x_y: A column of water strikes the target. When combined with its fire equivalent, the damage increases and a rainbow appears.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: A column of water strikes the target. When combined with its fire equivalent, the damage increases and a rainbow appears.
